pkgmetadata.longdescription: # vital-pythonThe official Python Library for [Vital API](https://docs.tryvital.io)# Install```pip install vital```# Installing locally```poetry build --format sdisttar -xvf dist/*-`poetry version -s`.tar.gz -O '*/setup.py' > setup.py```## DocumentationPlease refer to the official [Vital docs](https://docs.tryvital.io) provide a full reference on using this library.
